sense.name: make someone aware or counsel someone of possible danger or problem
sense.examples: The director warned him that he might be fired. The doctor warned him of the dangers of smoking, as it can cause cancer. I warned you that I would ask some difficult questions. Hey, I warned ya' it was long. I warned him not to go too far. I warned you against false assumptions. The old man warned the children off his property. She warned him not to take any action because whatever he did, he would regret it!
